entry.title: Passing arguments to rake task
entry.content:
``` ruby Rakefile namespace :log do desc 'Upload logfile to cloud-based server' task :upload, [:filename] => [:environment] do |t, args|

# upload logic
# args[:filename] is the passed argument

end end ```

$ rake log:upload[development.log]

# If the shell complains just escape the brackets

$ rake log:upload\[development.log\]

entry.title: Ignore upload directory while using Capistrano
entry.content:
$ git rm -r --cached public/uploads
$ cap deploy:setup

ruby config/deploy.rb set :shared_children, shared_children + %w{public/uploads}

entry.title: Start a Pry session on any unhandled exceptions
Unicode in irb
entry.content:
If you're having problems with unicode characters in IRB from ruby compiled with rbenv, do this:

$ brew install readline
$ export CPPFLAGS=-I/usr/local/Cellar/readline/6.2.4/include
$ export LDFLAGS=-L/usr/local/Cellar/readline/6.2.4/lib/
$ rbenv install 1.9.3-p194
